verses.text: \w A|strong="H1121"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* Asaph. \w The|strong="H1121"\w* God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* gods, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Lord hath spoken: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1121"\w* hath called \w the|strong="H1121"\w* earth. \w From|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* rising \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* sun, \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* going down thereof:
\w Out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Sion \w the|strong="H3605"\w* loveliness \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* beauty.

God \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* come manifestly: our God \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* come, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H1571"\w* keep silence. \w A|strong="H1571"\w* fire \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* burn before \w him|strong="H1121"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1571"\w* mighty tempest \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* round about \w him|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w He|strong="H8394"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* call heaven \w from|strong="H3820"\w* \w above|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* earth, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* judge \w his|strong="H1696"\w* \w people|strong="H3820"\w*.
Gather ye together \w his|strong="H5186"\w* saints \w to|strong="H0241"\w* \w him|strong="H5186"\w*: who set \w his|strong="H5186"\w* covenant before sacrifices.
\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* heavens \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* declare \w his|strong="H5437"\w* justice: \w for|strong="H3117"\w* God \w is|strong="H4100"\w* judge.

Hear, O \w my|strong="H5921"\w* people, \w and|strong="H6239"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H2428"\w* speak: O Israel, \w and|strong="H6239"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H2428"\w* testify \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thee: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am God, thy God.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* reprove thee \w for|strong="H0430"\w* thy sacrifices: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* thy burnt offerings \w are|strong="H0376"\w* always \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* sight.
\w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H2308"\w* take calves out \w of|strong="H5315"\w* thy house: nor he goats out \w of|strong="H5315"\w* thy flocks.

\w For|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H5750"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* woods \w are|strong="H3808"\w* mine: \w the|strong="H7200"\w* cattle \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* hills, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* oxen.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* know \w all|strong="H3162"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* fowls \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* air: \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w with|strong="H4191"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H3684"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* beauty \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* field.

If \w I|strong="H5921"\w* should \w be|strong="H8034"\w* hungry, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w would|strong="H8034"\w* not tell thee: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* world \w is|strong="H8034"\w* mine, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fulness thereof.
\w Shall|strong="H0929"\w* I eat the flesh \w of|strong="H0120"\w* bullocks? \w or|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H0929"\w* I drink the blood \w of|strong="H0120"\w* goats?
Offer \w to|strong="H1870"\w* God \w the|strong="H0310"\w* sacrifice \w of|strong="H1870"\w* praise: \w and|strong="H1870"\w* pay thy vows \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* most High.

\w And|strong="H6629"\w* call upon me \w in|strong="H3477"\w* \w the|strong="H1242"\w* \w day|strong="H1242"\w* \w of|strong="H4194"\w* trouble: \w I|strong="H1242"\w* \w will|strong="H3477"\w* deliver thee, \w and|strong="H6629"\w* thou shalt glorify me.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sinner \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath said: \w Why|strong="H3588"\w* dost thou declare \w my|strong="H3947"\w* justices, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* covenant \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w*?
\w Seeing|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast hated discipline: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* hast cast \w my|strong="H3588"\w* words behind thee.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* thou didst see \w a|strong="H3947"\w* thief thou didst \w run|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H3381"\w* \w him|strong="H0310"\w*: \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H3381"\w* adulterers thou hast \w been|strong="H4194"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* partaker.
Thy \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w* hath abounded \w with|strong="H5315"\w* evil, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* thy tongue framed deceits.
Sitting thou didst speak \w against|strong="H0935"\w* thy brother, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* didst lay \w a|strong="H7200"\w* scandal \w against|strong="H0935"\w* thy motherâ€™s son:

These \w things|strong="H3366"\w* hast thou done, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H0120"\w* silent. Thou thoughtest unjustly \w that|strong="H0929"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w should|strong="H0120"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0120"\w* thee: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H0120"\w* reprove thee, \w and|strong="H0120"\w* set \w before|strong="H3808"\w* thy face.
Understand these things, you that forget God; lest he snatch you away, and there be none to deliver you.
The sacrifice of praise shall glorify me: and there is the way by which I will shew him the salvation of God.
